titles.title: For the relief of Robert L. Quinn.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 7/19/1995--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of all unsettled claims against the United States for reimbursement of civil service annuity benefits.
